main event: An unidentified object was observed through binoculars in the sky over Santa Barbara, California on May 8, 1962.
interesting points: The object was described as oval-shaped, about half the size of the moon, and whitish in color.
The object was hovering and appeared to be 50 to 100 feet above the ground.
The object remained stationary for about 20 to 30 minutes before suddenly disappearing.
No noise or exhaust was observed from the object.
The report indicated the object was of a 'strange' nature and unusual in appearance.
